# 本周学习的知识分享
## 启航杯
### QHCTF For Year 2025
观察给的数字，均不大于31，猜测其为日期，根据其顺序在日历上画出如下图

![](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2025/png/49639454/1737807152530-02e07103-8c5a-4512-847e-2428b3471d20.png)

QHCTF{FUN}

### Esay_RSA
根据加密代码编写解密代码

```plain
from Crypto.PublicKey import RSA
from Crypto.Cipher import PKCS1_OAEP
import base64

private_key = '-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----\nMIICXQIBAAKBgQCvv9ru4j1QCqXhy3UXTvsONSwXRgynplyq3HpJOt6Baq1cL5Vz\nzB77F4pM/lepAMxNaMwsPNGW5hoURJhesOPgx7CGVlYjb41CGSbk+EXNq9GoQaYm\nMD8M8h8j6lJr7r+Xh6JCJ3HPho7mm0mUUM1fsfNIcTr7DJRAT7hMlVpvbQIDAQAB\nAoGAI2b4wY0WP7TdZGX5ELhqrxp75rZIH09ONGbURUMUBirIgBzftKNGDFtaExda\n7iLIhMFa+4BG0ehJEZMdxFlKlasJFLvOTSn7z7mwBYArYwHF4Pd3+QxJkeiyrW6x\nNe4TJ1JL/ku03U86md958Uw7VsnumXHgN2mmtTuSsRJDiYsCQQC2lTaeOK66aAEJ\nAXghIuisz3TNYAwrLhBoRnx1cYIkB2CBU6VNeNr+Z2npLCTet00W4ipWu+2KU7IN\nGDqOUwW/AkEA9ms4Mv/zstQk6AKdA/PqJDu2VPyHcTst2LEBVIBUkSJbjMhcpreO\nZ0l4GTIBMMgqfbg6b3BMvPVT5Td87N4N0wJAM4SO0L41rytBf4UGnHL5LCmtT3XW\neSiaQJIC9DB/BCOAu30am22KfVY4sC5giOc3vUk7oRWNxQYwqzk27InIiQJBANdp\n9ZAH1jcvYy/7EN3ivX19QbBbrd9bd4Glgt8m7EaPvW59vRj0/6TlQfrsjsPhR9vt\nUBAZIMxSvktzzV6X44cCQQCl33PJsk9/udNrJXvFVGt8G5czR4cZFjSDtt8SavTO\n8Bb+cztvSCmOqFnJX30XSkiLwZlNHqlMAdCbVtIRGi6B\n-----END RSA PRIVATE KEY-----'
encrypted_message = 'MdT+orX8HPOxt8ylR56Waaa9u2yBBcNjPKl95EOYgwOnRJ9FAOaXqg/2NA0VXcfHnt1OVd2EhPQ/5SZ3r21Ut592RxACa5xRiqPnCxZlXDToMfLnYC+26Jxr15kCEVOaw8DFtqfxfClZq0jjuyIy2snSBx175oIG0U2DH/9mp4s='
key = RSA.import_key(private_key)
cipher = PKCS1_OAEP.new(key)
decrypted_message = base64.b64decode(encrypted_message)
decrypted_message = cipher.decrypt(decrypted_message).decode()
print(decrypted_message)
```

QHCTF{c553b8c2-e49c-4420-828e-55dc79ddf07d}

## NSS
### [HDCTF 2023]Normal_Rsa  
复制粘贴

![](https://cdn.nlark.com/yuque/0/2025/png/49639454/1737942068050-1f36025b-9211-4b4e-a45e-b86f71642764.png)

```plain
import gmpy2 as gp
from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytes

P = 6773247693445539441213578786581644136043035242620265251725630106817272212428325283262417364786451280269516220237289567904055371962564710888510272312707201
Q = 
n = 
c = 
e = 65537
p = gp.iroot(P,2)[0]
q = gp.iroot(Q,2)[0]
r = n//p//q
phi = (p-1)*(q-1)*(r-1)
d = gp.invert(e,(p-1)*(r-1))
m = pow(c,d,p*r)
print(long_to_bytes(m))
```

NSSCTF{0b3663ed-67e4-44e2-aee7-7c2d8665b63c}

###  [闽盾杯 2021]decode  
```plain
import gmpy2 as gp
from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytes

file=open('decode.txt')
n=[]
e=[]
c=[]
for i in range(3):
    file.readline()
    n.append(int(file.readline()))
for i in range(3):
    file.readline()
    e.append(int(file.readline()))
for i in range(3):
    file.readline()
    c.append(int(file.readline()))
p=[,0,]
q=[,0,]
for i in range(0,3,2):
    if n[1]%p[i]==0:
        p[1]=p[i]
        q[1]=n[1]//p[1]
        break
    if n[1]%q[i]==0:
        q[1]=q[i]
        p[1]=n[1]//q[1]
        break
for i in range(3):
    phi=(p[i]-1)*(q[i]-1)
    d=gp.invert(e[i],phi)
    m = pow(c[i],d,n[i])
    print(long_to_bytes(m))
```

NSSCTF{G00d_w4y_tO_cR4ck_RS4}

# 本周学习总结
Normal_Rsa那道题做到都震惊了，估计是不小心把flag放上去忘删了吧，启航杯密码就一题还没什么难度，不过那道社工的地点找死了都没找到T_T，过年了可以瘫着了
